body:
@ProtectorOfLolis 
This is NOT Vol. 1 this actually COMIC LO 2008-01 (Jan) Vol. 46 (if you zoom in you can see it). Comic LO did not start out as a monthly release. Volumes 1-6 was actually a Special Release of COMIC Tenma starting with their October 2002 special issue. Then continued in their July 2003, Sept. 2003, March 2004, May 2004 and finally June 2004 issues. The first Comic LO volume under it's on label was Volume 7 on May 21st 2004 (so COMIC LO 2004-05 Vol. 7) and from there they released monthly under their own label.
After months of going through it all and searching far and wide i have finally found the No.1 issue relsease
Wrong categories. Not doujinshi but anthology.
1st issue? Wow not much has changed from these artists even though folks like: Kanyapyi, Maka Fushigi, Kinku, higashiyama show, Hidiri Rei makes the top tier stuff today IMO.
